roleReferences.name: Subaccount Admin

description: Administrative access to service brokers and environments on a subaccount level.

roleReferences.name: Subaccount Service Auditor

roleReferences.name: Subaccount Viewer
roleReferences.description: Role for subaccount members with read-only authorizations for core commercialization operations, such as viewing subaccount entitlements, details of environment instances, and job results.
